section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: In general, representation of members' interest and information seeking. Indication of (upcoming) legislation and/or enforcement activities for its members.
goals__remit: The Imported Tyre Manufacturers' Association is a trade association representing new tyre manufacturers and tyre branders whose manufacturing bases are located outside the EU. A primary aim of the association is to keep its members fully informed of all technical and legislative developments relating to or impacting on tyres and their sale and use in European markets.
